name: RAM (David Schutte)
description:
RAM was a HSC project that I created for my Industrial Technology: Multimedia major work. The game was developed in roughly nine months and was created in Game Maker Studio. The main idea behind the game was to create a 2D game with pre-rendered 3D assets, meaning that RAM was entirely animated in 3D.

The game features four levels plus a tutorial stage, a main menu, credits scene and intro title screen. This was one of the first games I've ever made (before I understood what OOP was), so don't expect a super high quality product but rather a time capsule to see how my skills have progressed as a developer.
